title: Miami Heat 's revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015/16 and 2016/17.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 294.0 was reported at Year 2018/19
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 91.0 was reached at Year 2002/03
